def has_remote_control(item:item):
    # Function to check if an item is a remote control
    symbol is_remote = is_remote_control(item)
    return is_remote

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        if exists remote: item : has_remote_control(remote):
            # Check if there is a known remote control based on the available information
            bind remote: item where:
                has_remote_control(remote) 
            # Select the remote control
            achieve close_char(char, remote) 
            # Move the character closer to the remote control

        else: 
            # If no known remote control is found, initiate exploration to locate one
            foreach item: item:
                if not visited(item):
                    # Check all unvisited items
                    observe(item, "Is this a remote control")
                    # Observe whether the item is a remote control

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind remote_control: item where:
            is_remote_control(remote_control) and close_char(char, remote_control)
        # Select remote control that is close to the character
        
        bind dvd_player: item where:
            is_dvd_player(dvd_player)
        # Select a DVD player

        achieve facing_char(char, dvd_player)
        # Ensure the character is facing the DVD player
        
        achieve is_on(dvd_player)
        # Turn on the DVD player

behavior use_remote_control(remote:item, dvd:item):
    body:
        achieve close(remote, dvd) # Ensure the remote is close to the DVD player
        bind switch: item where:
            is_remote_control(remote) and has_switch(remote)
        achieve is_on(dvd) # Use the remote control to turn on the DVD player
